content:
I was testing Epic's FHIR implementation, and am getting 404s when trying to hit any of their sandbox server urls. I was following along this tutorial: https://fhir.epic.com/Documentation?docId=oauth2&section=standaloneOauth2Launch

I've tried the following urls from this link: https://open.epic.com/MyApps/Endpoints but so far haven't had any luck. Could anyone else confirm this?
The Epic sandboxes should be up now.
they are still not up. I tried several queries against the endpoints and am still receiving errors
We were up, then down again. Our admins are working on it.

We should be back up now. If you notice any more issues - you can contact open@epic.com. I tend to hang out on chat.fhir and keep an eye out for Epic stuff, but open@epic.com is our official support channel.
